title: Retrieve legal notice for a category
description: Retrieves the legal notice that the user is required to agree to before listing. Most categories do not require that the user agree to a legal notice - these categories will return an empty string.

path.name: category
path.description: The number of the category to retrieve the legal notice for. This must be a leaf category (for example, you cannot view the legal notice for Business, Farming & Industry, but you can for Business, Farming & Industry > Carbon credits).

fields.name: Text
fields.description: The text which can be used to display a legal notice
